methods.name: Dataset
methods.description: Interact with your BigQuery dataset. Create a Dataset instance with bigquery#createDataset or bigquery#dataset.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

methods.name: get
methods.description:
Get a dataset if it exists.

You may optionally use this to "get or create" an object by providing an object with autoCreate set to true. Any extra configuration that is normally required for the create method must be contained within this object as well.

params.name: options.autoCreate
params.description: • Automatically create the object if it does not exist. Default: false

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

methods.name: setMetadata
methods.description: Sets the metadata of the Dataset object.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

methods.name: createTable
methods.description: Create a table given a tableId or configuration object.

params.name: options.schema
params.description: • A comma-separated list of name:type pairs. Valid types are "string", "integer", "float", "boolean", and "timestamp". If the type is omitted, it is assumed to be "string". Example: "name:string, age:integer". Schemas can also be specified as a JSON array of fields, which allows for nested and repeated fields. See a Table resource for more detailed information.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request

examples.caption: Delete the dataset, only if it does not have any tables.
Delete the dataset and any tables it contains.

params.name: options.force
params.description: • Force delete dataset and all tables. Default: false.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request

examples.caption: Get the tables as a readable object stream. table is a Table object
If you anticipate many results, you can end a stream early to prevent unnecessary processing and API requests.

params.name: query.maxApiCalls
params.description: • Maximum number of API calls to make.

params.name: query.pageToken
params.description: • Token returned from a previous call, to request the next page of results.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request

params.name: callback.tables
params.description: • The list of tables from your Dataset.

params.name: callback.nextQuery
params.description: • If present, query with this object to check for more results.

methods.name: query
methods.description:
Run a query scoped to your dataset.

See bigquery#query for full documentation of this method.
